Description: On I-64 at mile marker 295.2 in the City of Chesapeake, near High Rise Bridge, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 163 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north left center lane, right center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 121.4 in the County of Spotsylvania, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
